
# Add boost-cmake
set(BOOST_SOURCE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/boost" CACHE STRING "Boost source directory" FORCE)

# For Boost.Locale
set(BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_ICU_BACKEND OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_ICU_BACKEND" FORCE)
set(BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_ICONV_BACKEND OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off BOOST_LOCALE_ENABLE_ICONV_BACKEND" FORCE)

# For Boost.Iostreams
set(BOOST_IOSTREAMS_ENABLE_BZIP2 OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off BOOST_IOSTREAMS_ENABLE_BZIP2" FORCE)
set(BOOST_IOSTREAMS_ENABLE_ZLIB OFF CACHE BOOL "Turn off BOOST_IOSTREAMS_ENABLE_ZLIB" FORCE)

add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/boost-cmake)
